We also provide financial assistance to our neighbors through our 24 hour helpline. 1-618-310-1141", "notes": "Must be a resident of Calhoun County.  Closed on all major holidays, the 5th Wednesday as well as the Wednesday between Christmas and New Year's Day.", "contactName": "St Vincent de Paul of Blessed Trinity and St Francis of Assisi", "contactPhone": "618-576-2500", "contactEmail": "svdpcalhounil@hotmail.com", "servicePrograms": "The St. Vincent DePaul Helpline, Winnie's Closet", "foodServiceTypes": "Grocery / Client Choice, Home Delivery Service, Indoor Service, Lifting / Carrying Assistance, Pre-Packed Boxes / Bags", "dietRestrictions": "", "foodOfferings": "Dairy, Fruits & Vegetables, Household Products, Meat, Shelf Stable/Non-Perishable Goods, Toiletries / Hygiene Products", "networkAffiliations": [{"regionId": 17, "regionName": "St. Louis Area Foodbank", "logoBlobNameSmall": "2663eb40-ca6e-413e-8ab2-bf60bbdd2771.jpg", "website": "https://stlfoodbank.org/"}], "timeZoneName": "Central Standard Time", "timeZoneCode": "CT", "offsetHours": "-5", "schedules": ["Sunday 12:00 AM-11:30 PM (We are available 24/7)", "Monday 12:00 AM-11:30 PM (We are available 24/7)", "Tuesday 12:00 AM-11:30 PM (We are available 24/7)", "Wednesday 12:00 AM-11:30 PM (We are available 24/7)", "Wednesday 10:00 AM-4:00 PM (Closed on the 5th Wednesday)", "Wednesday 10:00 AM-4:00 PM", "Thursday 12:00 AM-11:30 PM (We are available 24/7)", "Friday 12:00 AM-11:30 PM (We are available 24/7)", "Saturday 12:00 AM-11:30 PM (We are available 24/7)"], "services": [], "specialHours": []}
